revisions.rev:
{{Use dmy dates|date=September 2010}} {{Infobox software | name = CCleaner | logo = [[File:CCleaner Logo.png|64px]] | screenshot = [[File:CCleaner.png|300px]] | caption = CCleaner on Windows 7 | developer = [[Piriform (company)|Piriform]] | released = {{Start date and age|2003|09|23|df=yes}} | latest_release_version = 3.13.1600 | latest_release_date = {{Start date and age|2011|11|28|df=yes}}{{cite web | url = http://www.piriform.com/ccleaner/version-history | title = CCleaner Version History | work = Official web site | publisher = Piriform | date = 24 Oct 2011 | accessdate = 24 Oct 2011 }} | language = [[#Languages|48 languages]] | platform = [[IA-32]] and [[x64]] | operating system = [[Windows 2000]] and later{{cite web | url = http://www.piriform.com/ccleaner/faq/installing/what-operating-systems-does-ccleaner-support | title = What operating systems does CCleaner support? | work = CCleaner - FAQ | publisher = Piriform | accessdate = 5 November 2010 }}
[[Mac OS X 10.5]] and later | genre = [[Utility software]] | license = [[Freemium]] | website = {{url|http://www.piriform.com/ccleaner}} }} '''CCleaner''' (formerly '''Crap Cleaner'''), developed by [[Piriform (company)|Piriform]] is a [[Utility program]] used to clean potentially unwanted files and invalid [[Windows Registry]] entries from a computer.{{cite web|url=http://www.piriform.com/ccleaner |title=CCleaner - Optimization and Cleaning - Free Download |publisher=Ccleaner.com |date= |accessdate=2011-10-26}} A public version for the [[Mac OS X]] has been released {{cite web|url=http://www.piriform.com/mac/ccleaner |title=CCleaner for Mac OS X |publisher=Ccleaner.com |date= |accessdate=2011-10-26}} along with a Network Edition. ==Features== CCleaner supports the cleaning of temporary or potentially unwanted files left by certain programs, including [[Firefox]], [[Opera (web browser)|Opera]], [[Internet Explorer]], [[Safari (web browser)|Safari]], [[Google Chrome]], [[Windows Media Player]], [[eMule]], [[Google Toolbar]], [[Netscape (web browser)|Netscape]], [[Microsoft Office]], [[Nero (software suite)|Nero]], [[Adobe Acrobat]], [[Mcafee]], [[Adobe Flash Player]], [[Sun Java]], [[WinRAR]], [[WinAce]], [[WinZip]], [[GIMP]] and other applications{{cite web |url = http://www.piriform.com/ccleaner/features |title = CCleaner - Features |work = Official web site |accessdate = 3 June 2010 |publisher = Piriform }} along with browsing history, [[HTTP cookie|cookie]]s, [[Recycle bin (computing)|Recycle bin]], memory dumps, file fragments, log files, system caches, application data, [[autocomplete]] form history, and various other data.{{cite web|url=http://thecoffeedesk.com/news/index.php/2009/05/20/tuning-windows-less-bull-more-speed/ |title=Tuning Windows: Less Bull, More Speed |date=20 May 2009 |accessdate=2 June 2009}} The program also includes a [[Windows Registry|registry]] cleaner to locate and correct problems in the Windows registry, such as missing references to shared DLLs, unused registration entries for [[file extensions]], and missing references [[Path (computing)|application paths]]. As of v2.27, CCleaner can [[Data remanence|wipe]] the MFT free space of a drive, or the entire drive itself. CCleaner can be employed to [[uninstall]] programs. In addition, CCleaner allows the alteration of start-up programs, similar to the Microsoft Windows [[MSConfig]] utility. Users can disable start-up programs.{{cite web |url = http://www.piriform.com/ccleaner/screenshots/screen/ccleaner5 |title = Screenshot #5: The Startup Tool |work = Official web site |publisher = Piriform |accessdate = 5 November 2010 }} As of version 2.19.901, CCleaner also allows users to delete system restore points.{{cite web |url = http://www.piriform.com/ccleaner/screenshots/screen/ccleaner6 |title = Screenshot #6: The System Restore tool |work = Official web site |publisher = Piriform |accessdate = 5 November 2010 }} ===Languages=== In addition to English, CCleaner is available in the following languages:{{cite web |title=Changing the language CCleaner uses |url=http://www.piriform.com/docs/ccleaner/ccleaner-settings/changing-the-language-ccleaner-uses |work=CCleaner Documentation |publisher=Piriform Ltd |accessdate=28 October 2011 }} {{multicol}} *Albanian *Arabic *Armenian *Azeri *Belarusian *Bosnian *Brazilian Portuguese *Bulgarian *Catalan *Chinese *Croatian *Czech *Danish *Dutch *Estonian {{Multicol-break}} *Farsi *Finnish *French *Galician *Georgian *German *Greek *Hebrew *Hungarian *Italian *Indonesian *Japanese *Kazakh *Korean *Kurdish *Lithuanian {{multicol-break}} *Macedonian *Norwegian *Polish *Portuguese *Romanian *Russian *Serbian *Slovak *Slovenian *Spanish *Swedish *Turkish *Ukrainian *Vietnamese {{multicol-end}} ==Critical reception== [[CNET]] editors gave the application a rating of 5/5 stars, calling it a "highly-recommended" and "a must-have tool" in spite of some minor glitches. In addition to that, CCleaner was awarded the April 2009 Editor's Choice Award by CNET.{{Cite web |url = http://download.cnet.com/ccleaner/ |title = CCleaner |work = [[Download.com]] |publisher = CBS Interactive |date = 28 October 2010 |first = Seth |last = Rosenblatt |accessdate = 15 May, 2011 }} ==See also== * [[Desktop Cleanup Wizard]] * [[Disk Cleanup]] * [[Norton Utilities]] * [[TuneUp Utilities]] ==References== {{Reflist}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Ccleaner}} [[Category:Utility software]] [[Category:2003 software]] [[ar:Ø³Ù ÙÙÙÙØ±]] [[ca:CCleaner]] [[cs:CCleaner]] [[da:CCleaner]] [[de:CCleaner]] [[es:CCleaner]] [[fr:CCleaner]] [[ko:CCleaner]] [[id:CCleaner]] [[it:CCleaner]] [[hu:CCleaner]] [[nl:CCleaner]] [[ja:CCleaner]] [[pl:CCleaner]] [[pt:CCleaner]] [[ru:CCleaner]] [[ckb:Ø³Û Ú©ÙÛÙÛØ±]] [[fi:CCleaner]] [[sv:CCleaner]] [[tg:CCleaner]] [[tr:CCleaner]] [[uk:CCleaner]] [[vi:CCleaner]] [[zh:CCleaner]]
